page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: {A Day in the life of Amy Ferguson and {Katherine Foster Aged 8 yrs. This is a normal Friday for us.We get up at 6.30 am. and read for an hour. The books we read are Famous Five books. Our Favourite one is number three it is "Five Run Away Together". Then we get dressed in different clothes depending on the weather.Then we go down for breakfast.We usually have cereal and sometimes toast.Then we brush our teeth.After that we have our hair brushed.Then we pack our school bags.We put in our recorder,a mauscript book,a pencil case and our lunch box.Then we get into the car and go to school and play tuggy outside till it is time to go in.Our teacher does the register then we learn the hymms for hymn practise.We have our milk and then go out to play.After play we work until hymn practise time.
